channel.title: (317) delta source shop editing
channel.description: Can someone help me on how to change the coordinates of a shop i just changed my home and i want to change all the shops. And for one of my shps i make it so players have to pk and the points add up so they can buy from it. and make it so the shop only takes pk points

item.title: (317) delta source shop editing
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Change the co-ordinates of the NPC using autospawn.cfg, find the NPC ID and next to there change their X and Y co-ordinate to where you want.

To spend the PK Points at shops you would need to add that into your buyItem method in client.java and assign it to a specific shopID

Read full topic
